short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows you the real title of an article before you click it on VG.no

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows extended information about news article when you hover over an article headline on vg.no, allowing you to know more about the content before deciding to click and read it.
